title: dessyhodin97
author: dessyhodin97
content: Good day everyone. I'm advertising my skills in community Management and content creation for both startup and already established projects on the Cryptocurrency space.You can reach me on telegram via @Hodin5 or reply to this thread, thank you.

comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: It is not very likely to get work as a newbie while there are many reputed members offering the same service.
